pkgmetadata.longdescription: Standard GNU file utilities (chmod, cp, dd, dir, ls, ...), text utilities (sort, tr, head, wc, ...), and shell utilities (whoami, who, ...)

use.flag: Add Linux capabilities support in output of file utilities (ls, dir, ...) via sys-libs/libcap
Build all tools into a single `coreutils` program akin to busybox to save space
Enable this if /bin and /usr/bin are separate directories
